welcomeTitle: The world of recipes awaits - welcome to {{APP_NAME}}!
welcomeText: Discover delicious recipes, create your personal collections, and plan meals to your taste. Enjoy cooking!
createProfileText: {{APP_NAME}} stores your recipes and settings in a personal profile. Let's create your profile to get started!
colorHelpText: This color will be used for your avatar if you don't have a profile picture.
